name: Irish Rainbow of Gold Slots Machine
name_original: Irish Rainbow of Gold Slots Machine
description:
If you love St-Patrick Day, download and play our new game: Irish Rainbow of Gold Slots Machine.
This New Slots game of 2017 is the HIGHEST PAYING slot machine! Experience the Ireland like never before. Featuring state of the art high resolution graphics and sounds, this Irish Slot machine recreate the feeling of chasing the famous lucky POTS OF GOLD all the way to Ireland! You will feel like you have been transported into this four-leaf clover field where all the Lep's are hidding there GOLDEN fortune in pot.
Are you ready to PLAY THIS SLOT MACHINE FOR FREE? And best of all, this casino slot machine does NOT NEED INTERNET CONNECTION!

- GORGEOUS and BEAUTIFUL IRISH SLOT animations keep you entertained!
- REAL VEGAS slot machines FEELING to recreate an authentic slot experience!
- RUNNING JACKPOT starting at $200,000 !!!
- HIGH QUALITY AUDIO for the best Las Vegas ambiance


This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
